metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11554 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
There is a stack consumption vulnerability in the lex function in parser.hpp (as used in sassc) in LibSass 3.4.5. A crafted input will lead to a remote denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-11554` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass1 - 3.4.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsass package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.8-1').
